## Applies To ##
* Python 2.7
## Solution Example ##
~~~~ #! /usr/bin/env python
import os
# Setup restrict default permissions os.umask(0077)
# Create a new world-readable file public_file = 'public.txt' with open(public_file, 'w') as f: f.write("World Readable content.")
# Increase permissions from restrictive umask to make file world readable os.chmod(public_file, 0744)
~~~~
